verses.text: \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Jeremias, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* hearken \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*,

\w Which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* \w furnace|strong="H3564"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*:

\w That|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* accomplish \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w oath|strong="H7621"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w flowing|strong="H2100"\w* \w with|strong="H2100"\w* \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*. \w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \w aloud|strong="H8085"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* protesting \w I|strong="H3588"\w* conjured \w your|strong="H8085"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: \w rising|strong="H7925"\w* \w early|strong="H7925"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* conjured \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Hearken ye \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w inclined|strong="H5186"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* walked \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* perverseness \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w A|strong="H4672"\w* \w conspiracy|strong="H7195"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w among|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w among|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*: \w so|strong="H1980"\w* \w these|strong="H1992"\w* likewise \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* strange \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*: \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Juda \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* void \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

Wherefore \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* evils \w upon|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w able|strong="H3201"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w escape|strong="H3318"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* hearken \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w offer|strong="H6999"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H6999"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* affliction.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* according \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* thy \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* Juda: \w and|strong="H3063"\w* according \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* thou hast \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w up|strong="H7760"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* confusion, \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w offer|strong="H6999"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H6999"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Baalim.

\w Therefore|strong="H0859"\w*, \w do|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* thou \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w do|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H6256"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H6256"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* affliction.

\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* meaning \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w beloved|strong="H3039"\w* hath wrought muck \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*? \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* take \w away|strong="H7451"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* thee thy \w crimes|strong="H7451"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H4100"\w* thou hast boasted?

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w a|strong="H7121"\w* plentiful \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w tree|strong="H2132"\w*, \w fair|strong="H3303"\w*, \w fruitful|strong="H6529"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H3303"\w*: \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H7121"\w* word, \w a|strong="H7121"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w kindled|strong="H3341"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w branches|strong="H1808"\w* thereof \w are|strong="H3068"\w* burnt.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w planted|strong="H5193"\w* thee, hath \w pronounced|strong="H1696"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thee: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* evils \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Juda, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w*, \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w provoke|strong="H3707"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w offering|strong="H6999"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H6999"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* Baalim.

\w But|strong="H7200"\w* thou, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, hast shewn \w me|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w*: \w then|strong="H0227"\w* thou shewedst \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w as|strong="H2803"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* meek \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w carried|strong="H2986"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* victim: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w devised|strong="H2803"\w* counsels \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, saying: \w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w put|strong="H2142"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* thou, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Sabaoth, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* judgest justly, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* triest \w the|strong="H0853"\w* reins \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w*, \w let|strong="H1540"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* thy \w revenge|strong="H5360"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w revealed|strong="H1540"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w cause|strong="H7379"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Anathoth|strong="H6068"\w*, \w who|strong="H0376"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* thy \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H0970"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w remains|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w upon|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Anathoth|strong="H6068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* visitation.
